abstract.t: The PKIX certificate format, and many associated formats, areexpressed using ASN.1. The current ASN.1 modules conform to the 1988version of ASN.1. This document updates those ASN.1 modules toconform to the 2002 version of ASN.1. There are no bits-on-the-wirechanges to any of the formats; this is simply a change to the syntax.
